trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus category

Levels.1: BODIES (color image of hands/feet on gray background)
Levels.2: BUILDINGS (color image of building on gray background)
Levels.3: FACES (color image of a face on gray background)
Levels.4: OBJECTS (color image of man-made or natural object on gray background)
Levels.6: SCRAMBLED (scrambled blocks of object classes on gray background)

trial_name.Description: Description of the stimulus category and which temporal condition it was shown in

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus mat file that was shown during this trial of the experiment

stim_file_index.Description: Index of the first stimulus in the images field of the stimulus mat file

stim_file_index2.Description: Index of the second stimulus in the images field of the stimulus mat file

category_repeat.Description: Boolean indicating if the second stimulus was from the same category or not
